sentences.en: A navigator checks the map and watches out for road signs.

sentences.cn: 哥伦布是个有名的航海家.

sentences.en: Did I mention all the action shots I'll take for the Navigator?
sentences.cn: 航海家上的那些精彩照片都是我拍的,您知道 吗 ?

sentences.en: He became an RAF navigator during the war.
sentences.cn: 他在战争期间成为皇家空军的领航员。

sentences.en: I feel guilty that I've kept everybody waiting while I kept travelling for Navigator's.
sentences.cn: 我一直忙于Navigator的旅行让大家久等了,我感到很愧疚.

sentences.en: Okay. Rumei, you can be my navigator.
sentences.cn: 好了, 如梅, 你可以给我当个“领航员”吧.

sentences.en: Sure . What does a navigator do?
sentences.cn: 当“领航员”都需要做 什么 ?

sentences.en: Tell us more during the making of Navigator?
sentences.cn: 能多告诉我们些有关制作NAVIGATOR的事情 吗 ?

sentences.en: That first citation is from 1557 and comes to us from a great navigator and map maker of the time.
sentences.cn: 这第一条引证出自1557年，而且它还将一位当时伟大的航海家和地理绘图者带入我们的视野。

sentences.en: The Dutch navigator Abel Tasman discovered 1642 New Zealand.
sentences.cn: 荷兰航海家阿贝尔·塔斯曼发现新西兰.

sentences.en: The man is a sixteenth Spanish navigator.
sentences.cn: 那个人是十六世纪的航海家.

sentences.en: The navigator charted the course of the ship.
sentences.cn: 领航员在航海图上标出船的航线.

sentences.en: The reputation of the navigator is under assault from historical revisionists.
sentences.cn: 这位航海家的名誉受到了历史修正主义者的攻击。

sentences.en: To see wrapped text, view page in Navigator window.
sentences.cn: 若要查看自动换行后的文本, 请在navigator窗口中查看本页.

sentences.en: Use your favorite keyboard shortcuts. Internet Explorer and Navigator share many of the same keyboard shortcuts.
sentences.cn: 使用您喜欢的快捷键. InternetExplorer和navigator使用的快捷键有很多是相同的.

sentences.en: Wang wants to buy a Lincoln Navigator. It's his favorite car.
sentences.cn: 王想买一辆林肯牌大轿车. 这是他最喜爱的汽车.

words.tran_cn: 可航行的；可驾驶的；适于航行的
驾驶，操纵；使通过；航行于
航海家；[航][水运]领航员；驾驶员

phrases.tran_cn: 网景领航员（浏览器名称）

trans.tran_cn: 航海家，航行者，航海者，领航员，（船舶，飞机的）驾驶员，一个浏览器的品牌
